DOC.brief_summary: The primary objective study investigate effect Cilostazol , Acetylsalycylic acid Clopidogrel alone well combination Cilostazol/Acetylsalicylic acid Cilostazol/ Clopidogrel ex-vivo Platelet Function ( PF ) testing .
DOC.criteria: Healthy Caucasian male subject Able read , write fully understand German language Provision write informed consent screen baseline BMI 19.0 30.0 kg/m2 , inclusive body weight 50.0 100.0 kg , inclusive Good general health determine investigator medical history , physical examination , vital sign , electrocardiogram , baseline safety lab Personal family history bleeding disorder , reasonable suspicion vascular malformation , include aneurysm Known predisposition bleeding ( e.g . active peptic ulceration , recent ( within 6 month ) haemorrhagic stroke , proliferative diabetic retinopathy , poorly control hypertension ) Use antibiotic within thirty ( 30 ) day prior screen baseline visit Clinically significant abnormality medical history , physical examination , vital sign , electrocardiogram , baseline safety lab Supine pulse rate > 100 beats/min < 50 beats/min Systolic blood pressure < 100 > 140 mmHg Diastolic blood pressure < 50 > 90 mmHg Concomitant use medication include overthecounter preparation
